update SYS_CONFIGS
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFIGS_TYPE = #{configsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFIGS_VALUES = #{configsValues,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where CONFIGS_ID = #{configsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_CONFIGS set TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIGS_TYPE = #{configsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIGS_VALUES = #{configsValues,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where CONFIGS_ID = #{configsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
,
from SYS_CONFIGS ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
